testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Verify multiple interactive elements exist (buttons, forms, links)
Check for proper navigation structure with working links
Verify application shows real estate content, not just 'Vite + React' text
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional real estate features with property listings, search, and interactive elements
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or lacks real estate functionality, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Landing Page Content Test
testCases.description: Verify landing page displays proper NatureEstate content
steps: Check page title is 'NatureEstate - Scenic Properties with Natural Beauty'
Verify hero section displays with scenic property images
Confirm 'Discover Properties with Breathtaking Natural Beauty' heading is visible
Check featured properties section loads with property cards
Verify country showcase section displays different countries
Confirm value proposition section explains NatureEstate benefits
testCases.expectedOutcome: Landing page displays comprehensive real estate content focused on scenic properties

testCases.name: Property Search Functionality
testCases.description: Test property search and filtering capabilities
steps: Use quick search form in hero section
Check properties are filtered according to search criteria
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality works and displays filtered property results

testCases.name: User Registration Process
testCases.description: Test user account creation functionality
steps: Fill out registration form with valid data
Verify successful registration message or redirect
Check user is logged in after registration
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can successfully create account and is automatically logged in

testCases.name: User Login Process
testCases.description: Test user authentication and login
steps: Verify successful login and redirect to dashboard
Check user authentication state is maintained
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can successfully log in and access authenticated features

testCases.name: Navigation System Test
testCases.description: Test main navigation and routing functionality
steps: Check top navigation bar is visible
Test all main navigation links work
Verify mobile navigation menu functions on small screens
Navigate between different pages (home, search, login, register)
Verify URL changes correctly for each route
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation elements work correctly and routes function properly

testCases.name: Property Details Page
testCases.description: Test individual property detail pages
steps: Click 'View Details' on a property card
Check property information is displayed (title, price, location)
Check property features and amenities are listed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property details page displays comprehensive property information

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Verify navigation adapts to screen size
Check property grid layouts adjust appropriately
Verify forms remain usable on small screens
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays properly and remains functional across all screen sizes

testCases.name: UI Components Test
testCases.description: Test that UI components are properly implemented and interactive
steps: Check buttons are clickable and have hover effects
Verify form inputs accept user input
Check modal dialogs open and close properly
Verify loading states display during async operations
Check success notifications appear when expected
testCases.expectedOutcome: All UI components are interactive and provide appropriate user feedback

testCases.name: Property Favorites Functionality
testCases.description: Test saving and managing favorite properties
steps: Click heart/favorite icon on a property
Verify property is added to favorites
Check favorited property appears in saved list
Verify favorites persist across browser sessions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can save, view, and manage favorite properties

testCases.name: Form Validation Test
testCases.description: Test form validation and error handling
steps: Navigate to registration or login form
Submit form with empty required fields
Enter password that doesn't meet requirements
Test form submission with valid data succeeds
testCases.expectedOutcome: Forms properly validate input and display helpful error messages

testCases.name: Advanced Search Filters
testCases.description: Test advanced property search filtering options
steps: Verify results update based on applied filters
Test clearing filters returns all results
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search filters work correctly and properly filter property results

testCases.name: Property Inquiry System
testCases.description: Test property inquiry and contact functionality
steps: Navigate to a property details page
Locate and fill out inquiry form
Check inquiry is recorded in system
Test inquiry management for property owners
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can successfully submit property inquiries and owners can manage them

testCases.name: User Dashboard Functionality
testCases.description: Test authenticated user dashboard features
testCases.expectedOutcome: Dashboard displays personalized user information and provides access to user features

testCases.name: Property Listing Creation
testCases.description: Test creating new property listings (for sellers/agents)
steps: Log in as seller or agent user
Add property photos if functionality exists
Check listing appears in search results
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authorized users can successfully create new property listings

testCases.name: Basic Accessibility Test
testCases.description: Test basic accessibility features
steps: Check all images have alt text
Verify form labels are properly associated
Test keyboard navigation through interactive elements
Check color contrast meets basic standards
Test screen reader compatibility with key elements
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application meets basic accessibility standards and is usable with assistive technologies

testCases.name: Basic Performance Test
testCases.description: Test application loading performance
steps: Check for console errors or warnings
Check for memory leaks during extended use
Verify API responses are reasonably fast
Test application with slow network conditions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly and performs well under normal conditions

testCases.name: Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Test application error handling and recovery
steps: Test behavior with network connectivity issues
Verify graceful handling of API errors
Test form submission with server errors
Test handling of expired authentication tokens
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully and provides helpful feedback to users

testCases.name: Data Persistence Test
testCases.description: Test data persistence and state management
steps: Log in and perform actions (save favorites, search)
Check saved data persists (favorites, search preferences)
Verify data consistency across browser sessions
testCases.expectedOutcome: User data and preferences persist correctly across browser sessions

testCases.name: Content Quality Test
testCases.description: Verify application has meaningful, professional content
steps: Check page has substantial content beyond placeholder text
Verify proper heading structure and hierarchy
Look for actual real estate features and functionality
Check for spelling and grammar errors
Verify images are appropriate and high-quality
Confirm content matches the scenic property theme
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application demonstrates real functionality with professional, high-quality content

testCases.name: Mobile Navigation Test
testCases.description: Test mobile-specific navigation features
steps: Verify hamburger menu appears on small screens
Test mobile menu opens and closes correctly
Check all navigation links work in mobile menu
Check mobile-specific UI elements function correctly
testCases.expectedOutcome: Mobile navigation provides full functionality and good user experience

testCases.name: Property Photos and Media
testCases.description: Test property photo display and management
steps: Test photo gallery functionality if available
Test photo upload functionality for property owners
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property photos display correctly and photo management features work properly

testCases.name: Search Results Pagination
testCases.description: Test pagination and result loading for property searches
steps: Perform property search with many results
Verify performance with large result sets
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search results are properly paginated and navigation between pages works smoothly

testCases.name: User Profile Management
testCases.description: Test user profile editing and management features
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can successfully view and update their profile information

testCases.name: Cross-Browser Compatibility
testCases.description: Test application compatibility across different browsers
steps: Check functionality works in all browsers
Test responsive behavior in different browsers
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application works consistently across major web browsers

test_execution_notes: Tests should be executed in order of priority (critical -> high -> medium -> low)
Authentication tests require valid test user credentials
Property-related tests depend on database having seed data
Mobile tests require viewport simulation or actual mobile devices
Performance tests should be conducted under consistent network conditions
Accessibility tests may require specialized tools or manual testing
Cross-browser tests require access to multiple browser environments
expected_failures: Social login functionality is not implemented (placeholder only)
Some advanced features may be in development
Image upload may use placeholder functionality

success_criteria.high_priority_tests: At least 90% of high priority tests must pass
success_criteria.overall_pass_rate: At least 80% of all tests should pass
success_criteria.functionality_requirement: Core real estate functionality must be working (not just placeholder content)
